summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, widening, extending, altering and establishing of North 82nd Street from Stroud Avenue to Stone Avenue, and Stone Avenue from North 82nd Street to the North margin of North 83rd Street, all in the City of Seattle, as public streets and highways, and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, and providing that the cost of said improvement be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law.
